name: Crazy Rabbits
description: Crazy Rabbits is a multiplayer FPS, where you can fight your friends or family. if you don't have any friends or family that want's to play with you, then don't worry, you can just join a random room! you can choose between multiple different types of rabbits with different types of guns. you can run around in multiple different maps with other people around the world. each rabbit has a different set of speed and how high they can jump. so every type of rabbit you pick will all have their pro's and con's, with a cartoony and low poly style, crazy rabbits will give you a fun experience for when you are bored!
